description:
Foil Senses Feat 7
GeneralSkill
Source Core Rulebook pg. 261
Prerequisites master in Stealth
You are adept at foiling creaturesâ€™ special senses and cautious enough to safeguard against them at all times. Whenever you use the Avoid Notice, Hide, or Sneak actions, you are always considered to be taking precautions against special senses (see the Detecting with Other Senses sidebar on page 465).
